member.name: IDirectManipulationManager2.CreateBehavior
member.summary: Factory method to create a behavior.
member.param: CLSID of the behavior. The CLSID specifies the type of behavior.
The IID of the behavior interface to create.
The new behavior object that implements the specified interface.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Extends the IDirectManipulationManager interface that provides access to all the Direct Manipulation features and APIs available to the client application.
The IDirectManipulationManager2 interface adds support for configuration behaviors that can be attached to a viewport.
summary.div: Note To obtain an IDirectManipulationManager2 interface pointer, on an existing IDirectManipulationManager interface pointer.
